column5: Hey folks, I have a black 1800 Lund Fisherman and it has several spots on the sides with some dock rash. It really isn't to bad and not through the paint and was hoping to clean it up.  Just looking for some suggestions from you on approach, type of compound and any does and donts when doing this.  Much appreciated as always.
Try polishing compound by turtle wax before using the more abrasive rubbing compounds.
Clay bar it first, then worry about a polish..  If you don't clay, you're just rubbing more crap into your paint.
